external_games.name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific FEF-3 Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific FEF-3 Loco Add-On
summary: The final steam locomotive built for Union Pacific, the FEF-3, comes to Train Simulator from Smokebox with an extensive array of detailing and features.The FEF was a class of three steam locomotives built by the American Locomotive Company (Alco) and operated by Union Pacific Railroad.
